content: the kick back relax socks are simple ribbed socks that extend the ribbing down the heel flap hugging the heel and creating socks with a very relaxed very comfortable sunday-morning-in-bed vibe these socks have a ribbed heel that extends the ribbing from the leg to the heel creating a stretchy heel that hugs the back of the foot and results in a comfortable relaxed fit however this heel is bulkier than a standard heel flap and might not fit as well into shoes and boots as other handknit socks therefore a less-bulky slipped stitch heel option is also included **finished size** 17 5 20 22 5 cm / 7 7 75 8 75 inches circumference **yarn** 1 skein 4ply/fingering weight yarn with optional contrast colour approximately 10 15g yarn required for contrast colour examples shown - skip rope yarn co double dutch sock in purple ponytail - jokamamo textiles platinum sock in mint choc chip and chocolate note for larger feet more than one skein of yarn may be required **needles** 2 25mm us 1 60 cm 24 inch circular needle or preferred sock-knittingng needle **gauge** 8 stitches x 11 5 row over 2 5cm 1 inch in stockinette
